info.title: Generic API
info.description: APIs that power the map, navigation, hierarchy, area relations, announcements, logs, syndication feeds, and metrics documentation.

get.description: Depending on service needs, checks resource connections and server health.
Given an area type / area code combination, produces the names, codes, and centroids for the ancestors of the area - i.e. larger, more general areas of which the requested area is a member.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area whose ancestors are being requested.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Code of the area whose ancestors are being requested.

200.description: Returns ancestors of the area code.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

example.nhsTrustName: Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type and / or area code.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given an area type / area code combination, produces the latest available record for a Super Output Area (SOA).

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area for which the latest data is requested.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Code of the area for which the latest data is requested.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Name of the metric for which the latest data is requested. Consult the 'Download Data' section of the site for available metrics.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Record date. If not defined, the latest available record will be returned.

200.description: Returns the latest available record for the given Super Output Area (SOA).

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

204.description: Undocumented. Likely that the data doesn't exist for the selected area type and metric combination.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type and / or area code.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Provides an array of areas of an area type.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area whose children are being requested.

200.description: Returns all areas for the given area type

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Get area code from specified area name and type

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area of the specified area name.

parameters.name: area_name
parameters.description: The area name to search by

200.description: Returns the area type, name and code

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type and / or area name.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given a category (website page), returns all available areas.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Category of the page whose areas are being requested.

200.description: Returns the areas for the specified category (page).

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid category (page name).

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given a category (page name) / area type combination, returns all areas available for that category under the given area type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Category of the page whose areas are being requested.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area by which to filter the areas associated with the given category.

200.description: Returns all areas for the specified category / area type combination.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid category and / or area type.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

get.description: Returns change logs, results are paginated to 20 results per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search the contents of the change logs for matching strings.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Returns the change logs for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Returns the change logs of the specified type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns page of results. There are 20 results per page and page count starts at 1.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the banners to be returned. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns the banners for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area by which to filter the areas associated with the given category.

parameters.name: area_name
parameters.description: Name of the area within the given area type.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

Banners for August 5th on Daily Summary.value:
[
  {
    "body": "Rates for cases and deaths for nations, regions and local authorities have been updated to use the latest population estimates for mid-2020, published by the Office for National Statistics. \r\n\r\nHospital admission rates for NHS Regions have been updated to use the mid-2019 population estimates, which are the most current for that geography. \r\n     \r\nThe updated population has been applied to all dates throughout the pandemic.",
    "date": "2021-08-05",
    "heading": "Updated population estimates used for rates of cases, hospital admissions and deaths",
    "high_priority": false,
    "id": "3e80c9b6-ebc5-4669-9e94-80f894e6fd38",
    "type": "change to metric"
  },
  {
    "body": "The daily reported vaccination figures for England since 27 July 2021 included a small number of people vaccinated in Wales. \r\n\r\nThese vaccinations have been removed from the figures for England for all affected dates, to ensure there is no double counting with the figures for Wales. \r\n\r\nThe UK totals have also been revised to reflect the change in the England numbers.",
    "date": "2021-08-05",
    "heading": "Revision to England vaccination numbers",
    "high_priority": false,
    "id": "d4a1dd7a-d070-4515-a106-7c9e7c9576e1",
    "type": "data issue"
  }
]

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Returns change logs for specified month.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Month and year formatted as YYYY-MM

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search the contents of the change logs for matching strings.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Returns the change logs for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Returns the change logs of the specified type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns page of results. There are 20 results per page and page count starts at 1.

Response for announcements.value:
[
  {
    "body": "On Thursday 5 August, case, hospital admission and death rates per 100,000 people for the UK, nations, regions and local authorities will be updated to use the mid-2020 population estimates.",
    "date": "2021-08-03",
    "expire": "2021-08-05",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "e6817475-dd68-4153-859c-91bc209421e6",
    "launch": "2021-08-03"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of technical difficulties in processing England deaths data, today's update is delayed.\nUK figures for 26 July 2021: 24,950 new cases | 46,589,211 people have now received the first dose of a vaccine | 37,287,384 have received a 2nd dose.",
    "date": "2021-07-26",
    "expire": "2021-07-26",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "e9dc5984-3a06-4a48-89ab-1f51322efeb4",
    "launch": "2021-07-25"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of technical difficulties in processing England deaths data, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-07-25",
    "expire": "2021-07-25",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "dcd7d3f2-fb12-4856-899b-ad8aaa5daeff",
    "launch": "2021-07-24"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of technical difficulties in processing England deaths data, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-07-24",
    "expire": "2021-07-24",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "4574413a-6d96-428c-85ee-d6ef1426d1f7",
    "launch": "2021-07-23"
  },
  {
    "body": "On Thursday 22 July, vaccination uptake for the UK, nations and Scottish local authorities will be updated to use the mid-2020 population estimates.",
    "date": "2021-07-20",
    "expire": "2021-07-22",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "f72d2ea8-fbc4-43f7-a0d1-3bc542eee397",
    "launch": "2021-07-20"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of a processing issue, today's update is delayed.\nUK figures for 14 July 2021: 42,302 new cases | 49 new deaths within 28 days of a positive test | 46,037,090 people have now received the first dose of a vaccine | 35,155,767 have received a 2nd dose.",
    "date": "2021-07-14",
    "expire": "2021-07-14",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "c7679c69-6e52-4dfd-95c6-869920400d1b",
    "launch": "2021-07-13"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of a processing issue, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-07-03",
    "expire": "2021-07-03",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "13287842-c84e-4023-bd42-b49297bb184a",
    "launch": "2021-07-02"
  },
  {
    "body": "**No update to England vaccinations.** Following an IT issue reported to the NHS on 21 June, it has not been possible to update vaccination figures for England. UK totals only include updates from Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales. [**More**](/details/whats-new)",
    "date": "2021-06-22",
    "expire": "2021-06-23",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "3bd18f1f-8f79-4d4a-9889-d437960bf2ad",
    "launch": "2021-06-22"
  },
  {
    "body": "**Improved local authority allocation for deaths in England.** Some deaths previously reported in England have been reallocated to different resident local authorities. Total deaths for England are unaffected, but some local authorities and regions will show inaccurate daily reported numbers because of this change. [**More**](/details/whats-new)",
    "date": "2021-06-16",
    "expire": "2021-06-17",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "5bc37a0d-293c-43d0-80e4-eeb9c4f7f67f",
    "launch": "2021-06-16"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of technical difficulties affecting reporting of vaccine data from Public Health Wales, today's update is delayed. We will update the dashboard as soon as we are able to.",
    "date": "2021-05-30",
    "expire": "2021-05-30",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "1f6fe758-c0a8-4414-924a-4103400dc91e",
    "launch": "2021-05-29"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of a delay in processing of vaccination data for local authorities and regions in England, they will be updated on the dashboard later today.",
    "date": "2021-05-25",
    "expire": "2021-05-26",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "2e97446c-8189-40e4-968e-9d07d0f98e57",
    "launch": "2021-05-25"
  },
  {
    "body": "**Revision to historical case data** The introduction of a new system disrupted the removal of cases where a positive rapid lateral flow test was followed by all negative laboratory tests taken within 3 days. 561 cases have been removed. Regions and LAs do not show the actual number of new cases reported. UK and England correctly reflect new cases reported. The issue will continue for a few days.",
    "date": "2021-05-19",
    "expire": "2021-05-20",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "edcebb61-ade5-4554-b66f-c7a70ccf67b7",
    "launch": "2021-05-19"
  },
  {
    "body": "**Revision to historical case data**. The introduction of a new system disrupted the removal of cases where a positive rapid lateral flow test was followed by all negative laboratory tests taken within 3 days. 4,776 additional cases have been removed. Regions and LAs do not show the actual number of new cases reported. UK and England correctly reflect new cases reported.",
    "date": "2021-05-18",
    "expire": "2021-05-19",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "3367b52e-5230-45a9-ac06-fa137fca3fa7",
    "launch": "2021-05-18"
  },
  {
    "body": "Because of a delay in receiving data from Public Health Scotland, today's update is delayed. The dashboard will not be updated before 5:30pm.",
    "date": "2021-05-11",
    "expire": "2021-05-11",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "e93d484d-69a3-4d8d-9e14-d49996786a46",
    "launch": "2021-05-10"
  },
  {
    "body": "Latest deaths data unavailable below UK level. [More](/details/whats-new)",
    "date": "2021-05-03",
    "expire": "2021-05-04",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "d6440d3e-ad71-49f5-9c8c-e819df23f907",
    "launch": "2021-05-03"
  },
  {
    "body": "Figures reported by Wales for 48 hour period. [More](/details/whats-new)",
    "date": "2021-04-19",
    "expire": "2021-04-20",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "83549e96-7d7e-4fd4-ae1f-88e05276431b",
    "launch": "2021-04-19"
  },
  {
    "body": "Due to a delay in receiving data from Public Health Wales, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-04-13",
    "expire": "2021-04-13",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "6ef82391-6a7d-49ab-9a5e-e19f1ffa5a55",
    "launch": "2021-04-12"
  },
  {
    "body": "**Change to case reporting and revision to historical case data** The way cases are reported has changed, resulting in the removal of a number of previously reported cases in England. This affects newly reported cases on 9 April. Regions and LAs do not show the actual number of new cases reported. UK and England newly reported cases have been adjusted and correctly reflect new cases reported.",
    "date": "2021-04-09",
    "expire": "2021-04-10",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "124951b4-0d15-487d-9013-9307bf04f4f0",
    "launch": "2021-04-07"
  },
  {
    "body": "During the Easter period, the COVID-19 Dashboard will be updated every day, but the amount of data being updated will vary. See full details in the [About the Data](/details/about-data#easter-2021-schedule) page.",
    "date": "2021-03-31",
    "expire": "2021-04-07",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "0fc3242d-5a3e-4e17-8715-e63ee39d6a74",
    "launch": "2021-03-30"
  },
  {
    "body": "Owing to a delay in receiving data from Northern Ireland, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-03-27",
    "expire": "2021-03-27",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "5705c20e-10c6-406e-8b0a-f2fc29cfce4b",
    "launch": "2021-03-26"
  },
  {
    "body": "Owing to processing issues for deaths in England, the numbers of deaths throughout the UK will be updated later. In the meantime, the number of newly reported deaths for 7 March 2021 may incorrectly show as zero.",
    "date": "2021-03-07",
    "expire": "2021-03-08",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "39f050e1-7ff5-4596-a040-8a9c1eb414d2",
    "launch": "2021-03-07"
  },
  {
    "body": "Owing to a delay in the submission of cases data for England to PHE, today's update is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-03-05",
    "expire": "2021-03-05",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "a214b990-1819-448b-a88a-c045d7c3ec24",
    "launch": "2021-03-04"
  },
  {
    "body": "Owing to an issue with the processing of cases data, the update for 3 March 2021 is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-03-02",
    "expire": "2021-03-03",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "cf30bd3f-6ada-40da-8f3a-5e5111db5327",
    "launch": "2021-03-02"
  },
  {
    "body": "Due to an issue with the processing of healthcare data for England, the most recent figures are incorrect. We are working to fix the issue and will publish corrected figures as soon as possible.",
    "date": "2021-02-05",
    "expire": "2021-02-06",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "b9b57c28-4aea-47b7-834c-f01203e1ccea",
    "launch": "2021-02-05"
  },
  {
    "body": "Complete our [quick survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc4GnaNWayFyBJxnoGHOnL1Igwo6KsOtDBAQYBN6uxWCDvH7Q/viewform) to help us improve this website.",
    "date": "2021-02-02",
    "expire": "2021-02-09",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "0358e0b1-601d-472b-b904-5dbf7cafbaa9",
    "launch": "2021-02-02"
  },
  {
    "body": "Due to an issue with the processing of deaths data, the update for 29 January 2021 does not include any updates to deaths figures. These will be added later today.",
    "date": "2021-01-29",
    "expire": "2021-01-30",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "ba39c22c-bda1-4e9a-a4d8-0d1e9025fa35",
    "launch": "2021-01-29"
  },
  {
    "body": "Due to an issue with the processing of deaths data, the update for 14 January 2021 is delayed.",
    "date": "2021-01-13",
    "expire": "2021-01-14",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "f65c3009-c80b-4944-919f-35520f807fa4",
    "launch": "2021-01-13"
  },
  {
    "body": "Owing to issues with Public Health Scotland Open Data API service, deaths by date of death for Scotland are missing, and the UK totals therefore exclude Scotland.",
    "date": "2021-01-11",
    "expire": "2021-01-12",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "dc4ef70f-909f-4be9-b537-1eefe93af997",
    "launch": "2021-01-11"
  },
  {
    "body": "During the holiday period, the COVID-19 Dashboard will be updated every day, but the amount of data being updated will vary. See full details in the [About the Data](/details/about-data#new-year-2021-schedule) page.",
    "date": "2020-12-23",
    "expire": "2021-01-05",
    "has_expired": true,
    "id": "f30ccab5-2cde-47ac-befe-03d597940c2d",
    "launch": "2020-12-23"
  }
]
